World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 31 日星期三 05:58:11 GMT 120
Japan earthquake survivors battle unsanitary conditions with no running waterA month on from a huge earthquake that struck Japan's west coast, survivors are battling freezing and unsanitary conditions while tens of thousands of homes remain without running water. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 05:40:42 GMT ZKBHTBRIGRLCFBVQ7PLHSP64FY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-earthquake-survivors-battle-unsanitary-conditions-with-no-running-water-2024-01-31/Sakura Murakami, Tom Bateman世界亚太地区
Ship carrying 16,000 sheep and cattle stranded off AustraliaA ship carrying around 14,000 sheep and 2,000 cattle is marooned off the coast of Australia in sweltering heat after it was forced to abandon a trip through the Red Sea, causing outcry from people concerned about the animals' welfare. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 05:34:42 GMT SFP3HELSR5MOZIFSJDRJ6TABJI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ship-carrying-16000-sheep-cattle-stranded-off-australia-2024-01-31/Peter Hobson世界亚太地区
Philippines' Marcos says no rift with the vice presidentPhilippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr said there was no rift between him and his Vice President Sara Duterte after both her brother and father strongly criticised him. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 05:31:45 GMT S43MYAKDCVO2TL6SRE6KVIR4TA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-marcos-says-no-rift-with-vice-president-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Pakistan ex-PM Imran Khan sentenced to 14 years in state gifts case - DawnPakistan's former Prime Minister Imran Khan and his wife Bushra Bibi have been sentenced to 14 years in jail in a case related to illegal selling of state gifts, the Dawn newspaper reported on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 05:18:15 GMT GHYFCUJ2RMMHJOZ7W7OHVC5VIY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-ex-pm-imran-khan-sentenced-14-years-state-gifts-case-dawn-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Iran warns of decisive response to any type of attackIran's envoy to the United Nations Amir Saeid Iravani warned that Tehran would respond decisively to any attack on its territory, its interests, or Iranian nationals outside its borders, state media reported on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 04:57:01 GMT RS77TJKNRBNXVBT3JRSBONWSQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-warns-decisive-response-any-type-attack-2024-01-31/Reuters世界中东
Brazil intelligence agency's second-in-command fired in illegal spying probeBrazil's president fired a top official from the country's intelligence agency on Tuesday amid a probe into suspected illegal spying during the presidency of Jair Bolsonaro. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 04:55:02 GMT SCLJXQNBJRKJJFDY4VO56SK6DU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-intelligence-agencys-second-in-command-fired-illegal-spying-probe-2024-01-31/Lisandra Paraguassu, Ricardo Brito世界美洲
South Korea's Yoon warns North Korea may try to disrupt April pollSouth Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol warned on Wednesday that North Korea could stage provocations such as armed actions near the shared border, drone intrusions, cyber attacks or spreading fake news in a bid to interfere in an election in April. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 04:40:49 GMT 5WYWASSFL5OE5PCKMXDIRVFNRI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-koreas-yoon-warns-north-korea-may-try-disrupt-april-poll-2024-01-31/Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
Taiwan president tells Pope Francis she supports his AI concernsTaiwan President Tsai Ing-wen has written to Pope Francis offering support for his concerns over the use of artificial intelligence (AI) and pledging deeper cooperation with the island's sole European ally. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 04:33:22 GMT BYQSSH6J6JNMNFHDNH3WB2F4LU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-tells-pope-francis-she-supports-his-ai-concerns-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
China says balloons that have angered Taiwan are 'nothing new'China's government on Wednesday dismissed repeated complaints by Taiwan about Chinese balloons flying over or near the island, saying they are for meteorological purposes and should not be hyped up for political reasons. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 04:11:23 GMT FY34GAKXKFLAPLAOL5GNKDWP3M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-balloons-that-have-angered-taiwan-are-nothing-new-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Sultan Ibrahim of Johor state installed as Malaysia's 17th kingMalaysia's Sultan Ibrahim from the southern state of Johor was installed as the country's 17th king on Wednesday, taking the oath of office in a ceremony at the national palace in Kuala Lumpur. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 03:32:15 GMT JALM5BS5PFJCFAY4ILZCWJMXRM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysia-installs-sultan-ibrahim-johor-state-new-king-2024-01-31/Danial Azhar, Rozanna Latiff世界亚太地区
China has indisputable sovereignty over Scarborough Shoal in South China Sea -Coast GuardChina has indisputable sovereignty over the Scarborough Shoal and its adjacent waters, and has always resolutely countered infringements by the Philippines, a spokesperson for China Coast Guard said in a statement released late Tuesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 03:25:58 GMT CAFUFVSRPJKJZOUMHVB7SW6BDU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-has-indisputable-sovereignty-over-scarborough-shoal-south-china-sea-coast-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
